org.displaytag.localization

Interface LocaleResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    I18nJstlAdapter, I18nSpringAdapter, I18nStruts2Adapter, I18nStrutsAdapter, I18nWebworkAdapter

    public interface LocaleResolver
    Handle the selection of the user locale. By default request.getLocale() is used, but specific implementations can use different way to determine the locale, for example looking at session variables or cookies.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Fabrizio Giustina

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Locale resolveLocale(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext)
      Returns the Locale choosen for the given request.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveLocale

        Locale resolveLocale(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext)
        Returns the Locale choosen for the given request.
        Parameters:
        pageContext - PageContext
        Returns:
        a valid Locale (null should never be returned)
